Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Menard
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via  Division, Central, Augusta and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Division/Menard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via  Division, Central, Augusta and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Division/Menard.

Allow extra travel time.
